Row.Text: "How brilliant is the autumn field, ripe with the fruit of enlightenment beneath the full moon."
"In the third month, a comet appeared in the southeast and a dragon flew past Mount Yangsan."
"It is no wonder that the founders of the Three Kingdoms had divine origins."
"Ah, Hwarang, you are the high pine branch that does not know frost."

When you form an [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance, both Leaders receive a free [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route from the other Leader's [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital (regardless of range); these [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes do not go away when the [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance ends and do not count against your [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route limit with this Civilization.
When you defeat an enemy Unit with a [icon:UNIT_HWARANG] Hwarang, gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
+5 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Land Trade Route Range to all Settlements.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Building.

All [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes between you and your [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Allies grant [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to the route's [icon:TRADE_INCOME] Trade Income.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources assigned to Trade Outpost or Factory Towns.
